translation.en: - There's something dangerous
about the boredom of teenage girls.
Coach said that once.
But she said it not like a mom
translation.it: Ma non lo disse come una madre

translation.en: or a teacher or a guidance counselor.
She said it like she knew
and understood.
Coach saw something in us--
something quivering and real.
She saw past the glitter and the hair and the attitude...
translation.it: Vedeva oltre i lustrini, i capelli, il carattere.

translation.en: To everything beneath. All our miseries.
Most of all,
she could see that we were waiting...
Had always been waiting...
for her.
It was fucking beautiful.
Until it went too far.
- You like the ones with the tapered tip, right, babe? - Yeah.
translation.it: - Li vuoi con la punta arrotondata, no? - Sì.

translation.en: ♪ I can make you all remember me ♪
♪ Little baby me ♪
- If you all got some game on, your star QB wouldn't be shipping off to basic.
translation.it: Se giocaste bene, il vostro quarterback non si sarebbe arruolato.

translation.en: - The recruiters don't lie.
It's one way out of Sutton Grove. - Yeah, and come back in a body bag.
translation.it: - è un modo per lasciare Sutton Grove. - Sì, e tornare morti.

translation.en: - Sounds like Sarge Will's been giving you the full-on hustle, huh?
translation.it: Il sergente Will ti sta tampinando?

translation.en: - He's not a bad dude.
- How hard do you think it would be?
Sarge Will?
You're not climbing that tree.
- Wanna make it interesting?
- No chance. - [laughs]
- I gotta keep my money.
You pulling a shift tonight, Slocum?
- Gotta fill that cup. You?
- Blow it off.
Come on. We'll practice.
- Yeah, you said that all summer, Captain, and we never did.
translation.it: Capitana, è tutta l'estate che lo dici, e non succede mai.

translation.en: - Well, go on. Show 'em the back tuck.
- Nice! - [laughs]
[applause] - Thank you.
- You're getting better.
Who the fuck cares?
- Does it look like I care?
I just don't wanna flame out before regionals.
translation.it: Non voglio spomparmi prima dei Regionali.

translation.en: That's all. - What? And the new coach is gonna get us there?
translation.it: E ci farà qualificare la nuova coach?

translation.en: Sounds like a porn star.
Classy one, though. She won't do anal.
translation.it: Ma una di classe, che non fa anale.

translation.en: Some fancy new coach from across the state
translation.it: Arriva una nuova coach da chissà dove

translation.en: thinks she can come and run my squad?
translation.it: e pensa di guidare la mia squadra?

translation.en: And as if she's hot. She's ancient.
translation.it: Manco fosse gnocca, è una vecchia decrepita.

translation.en: She's, like, 28.
I would like to see some 28-year-old ass do this.
translation.it: Vorrei vederla, una di 28 anni capace di fare questo.

translation.en: Come on.
Come on. [rock music]
You ready?
- Up. Up!
- Move!
You can bend those knees for ballers.
translation.it: Piegate le ginocchia per me, non solo per i giocatori.

translation.en: You can bend them for me.
translation.it: Piegate le ginocchia per me, non solo per i giocatori. Hanlon, continua così e dirai addio allo spazio tra le cosce

translation.en: Never gonna keep your thigh gap like that, Hanlon.
translation.it: Hanlon, continua così e dirai addio allo spazio tra le cosce

translation.en: Again, bitches.
Move it.
Go! Move!
- I think that's her.
Coming in like an OG.
I better tell Cap'n Beth.
Kicks.
V-sits.
That's enough. Line up.
First game is next Friday.
What do I see?
Spray tans.
Gummy-bear thighs.
Backyard tumblers.
But I don't see a squad.
And I do not see my top girl.
translation.it: e non vedo la mia top girl.

translation.en: - Beth's top girl. She's always-- - On my squads, you earn your spot.
translation.it: - La top girl è Beth... - Con me, il posto va meritato.

translation.en: You get strong. You rise.
That's how you get to regionals, become champions,
translation.it: È così che si va alle Regionali, si diventa campionesse

translation.en: get more for yourselves than Big Gulps and ballers.
translation.it: e si ottiene di più dalla vita che bibitoni e giocatori.

translation.en: - We graduated past ballers in the eighth grade.
translation.it: Giocatori? Abbiamo già passato i 14 anni.

translation.en: - No phones on my squad.
Tomorrow, come in a bra that fits.
translation.it: Domani, metti un reggiseno che ti stia.

translation.en: - [gasps] - Fix this.
We don't do this.
- Hey, do you have deodorant?
- I really like her hair. It's like Cinderella.
translation.it: Mi piacciono i suoi capelli. Sembra Cenerentola.

translation.en: - You heard Coach. Harness those babies.
translation.it: Sentito la coach? Tieni a bada le bombe.

translation.en: - Hey, my mom said I should be proud of my body.
translation.it: Mamma dice che devo essere fiera del mio corpo.

translation.en: - RiRi, catch.
- [laughs] That's gonna be stuck in my head all day.
translation.it: - L'avrò in testa tutto il giorno. - Ciao.

translation.en: - Man, she's so great. - Yeah.
- What are you up to tomorrow? - I don't know.
translation.it: - Che fai domani? - Non lo so.

translation.en: - Hey, fetus!
- I'll see you. - Okay.
- Didn't you hear about Coach French's last squad?
translation.it: Sai dell'ultima squadra della coach French?

translation.en: Her top girl?
- Yeah. Girl took a header.
Scalped her ponytail clean off.
translation.it: Le strappò di netto la coda.

translation.en: - Mm. - Dad said you made that up. - You better watch it, or...
translation.it: - Papà dice che è una bugia. - Fa' attenzione o...

translation.en: - Ow! Stop! Dad!
- Your chariot, fair daughter.
Can I offer two lovely ladies a ride?
- All right. You good?
- Bert's ride is so "Real Housewives."
translation.it: L'auto di Bert fa così Real Housewives.

translation.en: - Here's a thought:
blunts, Mom's Patrón, Lanvers Peak.
translation.it: Cannoni, tequila di mamma, Lanvers Peak.

translation.en: - I can't. - And I can't go home. Come on.
translation.it: - Non posso. - Io non posso andare a casa. Dai.

translation.en: - A crackdown at home.
Gotta study 'cause summer's officially over.
translation.it: Fine della pacchia, devo studiare, l'estate è ufficialmente finita, eccetera.

translation.en: All that shit.
- You call the po-po on me?
- I'll text you later, B, okay?
- It's been a while since you texted me for a rescue.
translation.it: Non mi chiamavi in tuo aiuto da un po'.

translation.en: - Yeah, well, you always say I'm full of surprises.
translation.it: Sì, beh, dici sempre che sono piena di sorprese.

translation.en: [door clicks shut] - It's me.
Your darling daughter?
Love of your life? Light of your loins?
translation.it: amore della tua vita, luce dei tuoi lombi.

translation.en: - Chris Brown won't quit you, huh?
- Ain't no party like a Pops Slocum party.
translation.it: Nessuno fa festa come papà Slocum. È mercoledì, siamo quasi al weekend.

translation.en: - Hey, it's Wednesday night. Practically the weekend.
translation.it: È mercoledì, siamo quasi al weekend.

translation.en: - Your dad knows you're here, Michael?
translation.it: Tuo papà sa che sei qui, Michael?

translation.en: - Yes, ma'am.
- Beats her usual partner in crime.
- Everybody hating on a white girl tonight.
- Hey, you were the one who pled rescue.
translation.it: Sei stata tu a chiedere aiuto.

translation.en: - The new coach worked us really hard today.
translation.it: La nuova coach ci ha fatto sudare.

translation.en: - Sounds like my kind of coach.
- Yeah, she took two squads to the Illinois State cheer tournament.
translation.it: Ha portato due squadre alle statali dell'Illinois.

translation.en: If we make it to state this year...
if we win...
- You always dream big.
Remember when you were little and you wanted to join the WNBA?
translation.it: Ricordi quando da piccola volevi entrare in WNBA?

translation.en: Mm-hmm, hanging on monkey bars for hours,
trying to make yourself taller?
translation.it: Passava ore alle sbarre, cercando di diventare più alta.

translation.en: - You don't get it.
Kentucky, OSU, Hawaii-- cheer scholarships are real.
translation.it: Kentucky, OSU e Hawaii danno borse di studio per cheerleader.

translation.en: - Oh, like football scholarships?
Yeah, I remember your dad at your age.
translation.it: Ricordo tuo padre alla tua età.

translation.en: "Baby, this arm is our ticket out of Sutton Grove.
translation.it: "Tesoro, questo braccio ci porterà via da qui.

translation.en: By this time next year, we'll be clubbing in Miami."
translation.it: L'anno prossimo, faremo festa a Miami."

translation.en: And we both know how that turned out.
Dinner in 20.
- She thinks if I make it into City freaking Tech, then I'm set for life.
translation.it: Pensa che se entro al City Tech sono a posto per sempre.

translation.en: - My pops thinks I can make assistant manager at Sonic someday.
translation.it: Secondo papà, un giorno sarò vicedirettore di fast food.

translation.en: - I just don't know why we can't go someplace real.
translation.it: Non possiamo andare in un posto vero?

translation.en: People do it.
- Yeah, certain people.
People born on third base.
- No. It can happen.
If you work hard enough,
you get strong. You rise.
translation.it: le più forti arrivano in alto.

translation.en: - Three, four. - Five, six, seven, eight.
translation.it: Tre, quattro, cinque, sei, sette, otto.

translation.en: One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight...
translation.it: Uno, due, tre, quattro, cinque, sei, sette.

translation.en: One, two, three, four, five.
- Let's see your pyramid.
- Three, four, five, six, seven, eight...
translation.it: Tre, quattro, cinque, sei, sette, otto.

translation.en: - One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight.
translation.it: Un, due, tre, quattro, cinque, sei, sette, otto.

translation.en: One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight.

translation.en: - Coming down.
- Five, six, seven, eight,
one, two, three, four, five.
- Okay.
Let's shake things up. Freshman, you're up.

She's five feet of hair.
translation.it: È alta un metro e mezzo.

translation.en: - Five feet of hair, get up there.
- I-- - You got this.
Don't you wanna make their jaws drop? It could be you on game day.
translation.it: Non vuoi stupirle? Magari toccherà a te alla partita.

translation.en: Three, four, five, six, seven, eight.
translation.it: Tre, quattro, cinque, sei, sette, otto.

translation.en: One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight.
translation.it: Un, due, tre, quattro, cinque, sei, sette, otto.

translation.en: One, two, three, four, five, six, seven... - [struggles] - Eight.
translation.it: Un, due, tre, quattro, cinque, sei, sette, otto.

translation.en: - [winces] - Hey. - [grunts] - N--look out.
Lock out. Lock out your knees.
- No. Tighten up.
- Okay. You're okay.
All right. Come on. Stand up.
- Shake it off.
Good.
Okay, let's go over the choreography.
Come on.
Can I talk to you for a minute?
- Sure. [mints rattle]
I was, uh, here three days before I realized it wasn't plugged in.
translation.it: Ci ho messo tre giorni a capire che non era accesa.

translation.en: - Yeah. Coach Melvoy's screwup.
The gift that keeps on giving.
translation.it: Il dono che non finisce mai.

translation.en: [chuckles] Like herpes.
Beth says that.
- But you're not Beth.
- That's what I came to talk to you about.
translation.it: È di questo che volevo parlarle.

translation.en: [inhales] Beth.
Look, you want to be careful with her.
- Go easy on her? Give her special treatment?
translation.it: Andarci piano? - Trattarla coi guanti? - No, non intendo questo.

translation.en: - No, that's not what I mean.
translation.it: - Trattarla coi guanti? - No, non intendo questo.

translation.en: Beth's dad--you know, Mr. Cassidy?
He's a big dog here.
- Yeah, I got that.
- He's not a great dad, and Tacy...
translation.it: Non è un gran padre e... - Tacy... - Le sorelle non vanno mai d'accordo.

translation.en: - Sisters never get along.
translation.it: - Tacy... - Le sorelle non vanno mai d'accordo.

translation.en: - Half sisters.
Tacy's mom is Mr. Cassidy's sidepiece.
translation.it: La mamma di Tacy era l'amante di Cassidy.

translation.en: Lives right across the street.
Still does, except now, Beth's dad lives there too.
translation.it: Ci abita ancora, insieme al padre di Beth.

translation.en: Small towns can be fucked up.
Look, I get that she's your friend.
- She is.
- I've known a lot of Beths.
She needs limits. I'm giving them to her. It's that simple.
translation.it: Le servono limiti e io glieli do. Fine.

translation.en: I gotta go.
- Date night with Mr. Coach?
- [chuckling] Yeah.
He likes to show me off.
Thanks.
- You got no gag reflex.
- That's not what her boyfriend says.
translation.it: Il suo ragazzo dice di sì.

translation.en: - I think she lives on Fairview.
- She's probably not even home.
- I'm telling you, there's something off about her.
translation.it: Io te lo dico, non me la racconta giusta.

translation.en: - You're just pissed because she let Tacy be top girl today.
translation.it: Sei solo incazzata perché ha fatto fare la top girl a Tacy.

translation.en: But screw it.
You'll be back on top on Friday.
- What?
- You should just be on my side.
- We all wanted a real coach.
A winning coach. Remember?
- If she's such hot shit, why'd she move back here?
translation.it: Se è così figa, perché è tornata qui?

translation.en: She only grew up, like, two towns over,
translation.it: Viene da un posto qui vicino,

translation.en: in that armpit Sterling Heights, where we bought beer in junior high.
translation.it: quel cesso di Sterling Heights in cui compravamo la birra.

translation.en: - I know. - How do you know?
- Anyone can Google.
♪ I'm moving fast... ♪ - This must be it. - ♪ I cannot answer ♪
- And you said she wouldn't be home.
- That's the husband?
He looks like a youth pastor.
God, I wouldn't fuck him.
- He'll be heartbroken.
♪ Little cat, you is a... ♪ - Come on. Let's just go. This is crazy.
- Why you got such a hard-on for her?
- I don't. - I can see it from here.
It's a rando flasher hard-on.
- Wait, do you wanna fuck her? - What? No!
translation.it: - Te la vuoi scopare? - Che? No!

translation.en: [stammers] - You wanna fuck her. Coach! - Stop!
translation.it: - Te la vuoi scopare. Coach! - Basta!

translation.en: - Someone out here wants to fuck you! - Shh! Shut up!
translation.it: - Qui c'è qualcuno che vuole scoparti! - Zitta!

translation.en: Shut up!
- Go! Drive! Beth!
- [sighs] Is the peanut gallery still out there?
I'm telling you, these girls are nothing but boxed wine and attitude.
translation.it: Queste ragazze sono tutte vino in cartone e cattiveria.

translation.en: - Huh. That reminds me of somebody I used to know.
- Do I look like a boxed wine girl to you?
translation.it: TI sembro una da vino in cartone?

translation.en: - Mm, nah, I bet you were more of a Mad Dog type.
translation.it: No, secondo me eri più da birra ignorante.

translation.en: - Hey, you'll whip them into shape.
I was gonna give you these after the game,
but I thought maybe you'd wanna wear them to the party.
translation.it: ma ho pensato che magari volevi metterle alla festa.

translation.en: - Matt.
Jesus.
- What'd your mom always say? "Every lady ought to"...
translation.it: Tua mamma diceva: "Ogni donna deve avere..."

translation.en: - [chuckles] ..."have a pair of red shoes like Dorothy."
Matt, we need to budget.
- It's not what we can afford. It's what you deserve.
translation.it: Non è questione di soldi, ma di quello che meriti. Ok?

translation.en: Okay? - Well--ah... [sighs]
translation.it: ma di quello che meriti. Ok?

translation.en: - Look, I know we moved here for me-- for--for this job--
translation.it: Siamo venuti qui per me, per il lavoro...

translation.en: - It was for both of us.
- Yeah, but come on. You're the one--you're the one back where you started.
translation.it: Sì, ma tu sei tornata al punto di partenza.

translation.en: It-- - It's just for now. We're gonna make it work together.
translation.it: Solo per ora. Ce la faremo, assieme.

translation.en: - No "I" in team, Coach? - [groans]
Look, I just want you to know that I haven't forgotten
translation.it: Voglio solo che tu sappia che non ho dimenticato le mie promesse.

translation.en: all the promises I made you, okay?
translation.it: che non ho dimenticato le mie promesse.

translation.en: - Hey, gorgeous. My lucky day.
translation.it: Ehi, bellezza! Il mio giorno fortunato!

translation.en: Ah, I'm J.J. Curtis, RiRi's mom.
translation.it: Sono JJ Curtis, la madre di RiRi.

translation.en: - Hey. Colette French.
- We are so happy to have you here leading our girls.
translation.it: Siamo felici di averti qui a guidare le ragazze.

translation.en: I--I don't know how Bert pulled it off.
translation.it: Non so come abbia fatto Bert...

translation.en: - Yeah, we've got a ways to go. The girls are-- - Lazy. Raised on Ritalin and free porn.
translation.it: - C'è da lavorare. Le ragazze sono... - Pigre, cresciute a Ritalin e porno?

translation.en: Uh, so, uh, the squad boosters.
We have these brunches, and I would love to host one for you.
translation.it: facciamo dei brunch, e vorrei tenerne uno per te.

translation.en: - Thanks. Uh, maybe once we get settled--
- RiRi is crazy about you.
How about Sunday?
Real casual-- day drinking, telling dirty jokes.
translation.it: Beviamo una cosa, raccontiamo due barzellette sconce.

translation.en: - Sorry. Maybe in a few weeks, when--
- Come on. Just the girls. - I can't.
translation.it: - Una cosa tra ragazze. - Non posso.

translation.en: [stammers] I'm really focused on the game, and it's coming up fast.
translation.it: Sono concentrata sulla partita, e manca poco.

translation.en: And that's what you wanted me here for, right?
- Of course. [laughs]
- Okay. Head up. No sloppy stuff.
Again. Trust yourself. - [exhales]
- Better.
- Did you go there?
- Yeah.
- I'm thinking of places to apply.
translation.it: Sto pensando a dove far domanda.

translation.en: Maybe more places than I thought.
- You should. Do your research.
- I just wanna go, you know?
- Hanlon, it's important to have an exit plan
translation.it: Hanlon, devi avere un piano di fuga

translation.en: that's more than just an exit.
translation.it: che non sia solo una fuga.

translation.en: - Okay.
- Open it.
Open.
- Good.
- It shut down when I was a kid.
- Tires, right?
- I used to hear the chug-chug all day long, and one day, it just stopped.
translation.it: Faceva rumore tutto il giorno e un giorno si fermò.

translation.en: The stadium they were building for the football team, that stopped too.
translation.it: Come pure lo stadio da football che stavano costruendo.

translation.en: Everything just stopped.
- Reminds me of Roman ruins.
Hey, who's that, um...
that cute cross-country kid with the curly hair?
translation.it: ...il ragazzino riccio e carino che fa corsa campestre?

translation.en: - The one with the headphones? - Yeah.
[chuckling] Yeah. - Jordy Jones?
[laughs] He's nobody.
- Nobody won't distract you.
Nobody'll make you feel good.
- So how did you end up here?
I mean, you could be anywhere. You could run squads anywhere.
- I wanna be here.
My husband, Matt, he has a chance here.
translation.it: Mio marito, Matt, ha una chance.

translation.en: He hasn't had many chances-- not like he thought.
translation.it: Non ne ha avute tante come sperava

translation.en: And he's given me so many.
translation.it: e a me ne ha date tante.

translation.en: I owed him.
It's grown-up bullshit, right?
- No.
I mean, I don't know.
I don't know many married people, though--
I mean, that are still married.
- Maybe you'll be smarter than I was, Hanlon.
translation.it: Forse sarai più furba di me, Hanlon,

translation.en: About all this.
Maybe you already are.
- Uh, that's me.
- You're not like the others.
But you know that, don't you?
- [quietly] Yes.
- So that's the new coach?
The blonde lady that couldn't stop and introduce herself?
translation.it: Una bionda che non si ferma a presentarsi?

translation.en: Hey, I got the, uh, stuff you wanted.
translation.it: Ho preso la roba che volevi.

translation.en: The flaxseed.
I went to three different stores. [chuckles]
- Oh, yeah. Thanks.
He's back. - Sarge Will.
- Wonder what he did all summer. - I wonder who he did all summer.
translation.it: - Che avrà fatto tutta l'estate? - Chi si sarà fatto tutta l'estate?

translation.en: - Listen, I'm gonna give you my card
translation.it: Senti, ti do il mio biglietto,

translation.en: with my personal cell phone on it.
- Thanks. - Oh, no.
- Oh, RiRi.
Pathetic. - [scoffs]
Your turn.
- She took your bet?
- Well, it's no fun playing by yourself.
translation.it: Non è divertente giocare da sola.

translation.en: Been doing that a lot lately.
- I just have important things to do.
Things I care about.
You coming to calc?
- Why?
- No. Like this.
[grunts] This.
- Mom. Mom!
- Hey, sweetie pie.
This isn't what you think. Your mom-- - We're not your family anymore.
translation.it: - non è come sembra. - Non siamo più la tua famiglia.

translation.en: - Listen-- - Get out.
- Would you just listen... - Get out.
translation.it: - Va' via! - Mi ascolti un attimo?

translation.en: - To me for a second? Your mother--
translation.it: - Va' via! - Mi ascolti un attimo? - Tua ma... - Va' da tua moglie e tua figlia!

translation.en: - Go home to your wife and your daughter!
translation.it: - Tua ma... - Va' da tua moglie e tua figlia!

translation.en: Your other wife and daughter. Go! - Baby girl. Baby girl, just listen.
translation.it: - Le tue altre moglie e figlia, vai! - Tesoro, ascolta.

translation.it: Non ho mai saputo dirle di no.

translation.en: - Fuck you.
- Remember when...
you turned six, and we all drove down to Stony Creek
translation.it: ...compiesti sei anni e andammo tutti a Stoney Creek

translation.en: and had that cookout? You remember that, don't you?
translation.it: a fare una grigliata? Ricordi, no?

translation.en: - Sure.
- We all fell asleep after Funfetti cake,
and I woke up to you saying, "Mom! Mom! The sky turned orange."
translation.it: e mi svegliai con te che urlavi: "Mamma! Il cielo è arancione!"

translation.en: - I said it was beautiful. You said it was pollution.
translation.it: Io dissi che era bello, tu che era l'inquinamento.

translation.en: - [laughs] And then Dad said, "That's not pollution, ladies. That's progress."
translation.it: E poi papà disse: "No, fanciulle. Quello è il progresso".

translation.en: - I can't wait till I can get out of here.
I can't wait.
- You think it's gonna be easy.
You'll leave. You'll be free!
- I never thought anything would be easy.

Huddle up!
I'm gonna tell you a secret.
There is no one better than you.
You are the strongest, meanest,

translation.en: baddest women this town has ever seen,
translation.it: e toste che questa città abbia mai visto,

translation.en: and you are about to show everyone what you are made of:
translation.it: E ora mostrerete di che pasta siete fatte.

translation.en: the hard, hard gold that pounds in your chests.

translation.en: You are royalty now. You're gods.
Make them bow down.
translation.it: Che si prostrino dinanzi a voi.

translation.en: Do me proud.
- Mmkay. This is it.
Fast, tight, light. Just like in practice.
translation.it: Veloci e leggere come in allenamento.

translation.en: That means you. Tacy's top.
translation.it: Intendo te. Tacy è la top girl.

translation.en: - You can't be serious.
You put her up there, she's gonna break her neck. I'm top girl.
translation.it: Se la fa salire, si spezzerà il collo. Sono io la top girl.

translation.en: - Top girl is a girl who shows, every practice, every game.
translation.it: La top girl non manca un allenamento né una partita.

translation.en: - I showed. I'm here.
- Top girl is a girl who can control herself.
- I'm the captain. - We're not doing captains anymore.
translation.it: - Sono la capitana. - Non ci sono capitane.

translation.en: - No, I'm captain. This is my squad.
translation.it: - Questa è la mia squadra! - No!

translation.en: It's mine.
My squads don't have captains.
translation.it: Le mie squadre non hanno capitane.

translation.en: You got this.
Let's go.
crowd: [chanting] Eagles! Eagles! Eagles!
- What was I supposed to do?
Let her fall? It was Coach's choice.
translation.it: Farla cadere? La coach ha scelto.

translation.en: - You chose to be her little bitch.
translation.it: E tu hai scelto di essere la sua troietta.

translation.en: - A diamond in a rhinestone world.
translation.it: Un diamante in un mondo di strass. Coach.

translation.en: Coach. - Wow. We pulled it off.
- Oh, more than that.
I was talking to the regionals organizers. They're interested in letting us host.
translation.it: Forse gli organizzatori delle Regionali ci sceglieranno come sede.

translation.en: - Mm. That'd be great. First round bye.
- Hell yes. Look what you did in just one week.
translation.it: Guarda cos'hai saputo fare in una settimana!

translation.en: We're back on the map again.
translation.it: Siamo di nuovo in gioco. Non ci considereranno più

translation.en: They'll stop thinking of us as a Rust Belt backwater
translation.it: Siamo di nuovo in gioco. Non ci considereranno più un buco dimenticato quando vedranno il progetto dello stadio.

translation.en: once they get an eyeful of that stadium plan.
translation.it: un buco dimenticato quando vedranno il progetto dello stadio.

translation.en: And we intend to get you
translation.it: Vogliamo darti tutto ciò che serve

translation.en: everything you need to lay hands
translation.it: Vogliamo darti tutto ciò che serve per arrivare alla vittoria.

translation.en: on those tournament rings.
- [laughs] What he really means is that we're hitching all our wagons to your star, Coach French.
translation.it: Ciò che intende dire è che dipendiamo tutti da te, coach French.

translation.en: - No pressure.
Pressure's how diamonds get made.
translation.it: È con la pressione che si fanno i diamanti.

translation.en: - All right, all right, Sutton Grove! - Ow!
- Thank you guys. [applause]
So listen. Our football team, huh?
translation.it: Sentite. La nostra squadra di football.

translation.en: Got the shit kicked out of them tonight...
translation.it: Si sono fatti fare il culo.

translation.en: Jeez. Again.
[laughs] How times have changed. When a lot of us went to school here,
translation.it: Come cambiano i tempi! Quando andavamo a scuola noi,

translation.en: everything was football, right? We thought it would be that way forever.
translation.it: vivevamo per il football. Pensavamo sarebbe stato così per sempre.

translation.en: We even had a plan to build a big, gleaming new stadium for our boys.
translation.it: Avevamo progettato un nuovo, grande stadio per i nostri ragazzi.

translation.en: We had to put that dream on hold. We were struggling.
translation.it: Lo mettemmo in pausa perché erano tempi duri.

translation.en: All right? Like so many American towns...
translation.it: Come in tante altre città d'America.

translation.en: felt left behind. But no more.
translation.it: Ci hanno lasciato indietro. Ma ora basta.

translation.en: Tonight, friends--tonight, we witnessed a transformation.
translation.it: Stasera abbiamo assistito a una trasformazione.

translation.en: We saw how good our girls could be.
translation.it: Abbiamo visto quanto sono forti le nostre ragazze.

translation.en: We saw that they could take the lead.
These girls right here. [cheers and applause]
Who run the world?
Who run the--girls!
G--girls. You've seen the T-shirt. Come on, you guys. [laughs]
translation.it: L'avete vista la t-shirt, no? E dai!

translation.en: Leaving me hanging up here. Now, listen.
Some people say cheer is not a sport.
translation.it: Dicono che il cheerleading non è uno sport.

translation.en: I think Coach French over here would disagree,
translation.it: Credo che coach French non sia d'accordo,

translation.en: but I can tell you this:
it is a business.
It's an industry. It's the future.
translation.it: Un'industria. È il futuro, un futuro in arrivo qui a Sutton Grove.

translation.en: And it is a future that is coming here to Sutton Grove.
translation.it: È il futuro, un futuro in arrivo qui a Sutton Grove.

translation.en: Let's hear it! Come on! [cheers and applause]
Folks, a stadium can transform a town.
translation.it: Uno stadio può trasformare una città.

translation.en: A stadium can heal a town.
translation.it: Uno stadio può guarire una città.

translation.en: If we build this, they will come!
When we have this stadium-- when we have this stadium,
translation.it: Quando avremo lo stadio, questo stadio, questo faro nel buio,

translation.en: this beacon, this lodestar,
translation.it: questo stadio, questo faro nel buio, questa stella polare, nulla ci sarà precluso!

translation.en: there is nothing we can't do.
translation.it: questa stella polare, nulla ci sarà precluso!

translation.en: Sutton Grove begins again!
♪ Like a mechanical bull ♪ - Wait.
Him. - ♪ Then you'll be sorry... ♪
- Him? Why?
- ♪ Like a mechanical bull ♪ - Why not?
- Hey! Jordy Jones!
- ♪ You've been at my throat ♪ - Get in!
It's your lucky day.
♪ You've been at my throat ♪ - You better have weed.
- Hey. - Hi.
- Hey! Jailbait! Is that my phone?
translation.it: Ehi, minorenne, è il mio telefono?

translation.en: - Hey. Soldier boy.
What else you got in that car?
- Seriously?
The head push? You're pulling that shit on me?
translation.it: Mi spingi la testa? Cazzo fai?

translation.en: - I just--I-- I don't know what you want.
translation.it: È solo che... non so cosa vuoi.

translation.en: Just...
Make me feel good...
Make me feel...
- You must be Matt. [laughs]
- Yeah. - I'm J.J. Hi.
Welcome to our nest of vipers. [laughs]
translation.it: Benvenuto nel covo delle vipere. Ma ci sarai abituato. Lavori per Bert.

translation.en: But you're probably used to that, working for Bert.
translation.it: Ma ci sarai abituato. Lavori per Bert.

translation.en: - Um, no--no bites yet. - [laughs] - But I just started.
translation.it: Niente morsi, per ora. Ho appena iniziato.

translation.en: I'm the project manager for the new stadium.
translation.it: Sono il direttore del progetto del nuovo stadio.

translation.en: - I know. I know.
What I don't know is which one of you he had his eyes on first.
translation.it: Quello che non so è chi di voi due ha visto prima.

translation.en: - Well, he's had his sights trained on your wife
since she took Jeff East to state.
We just never thought we could land her.
Never say Bert Cassidy doesn't know how to sweeten a deal.
translation.it: Ma Bert Cassidy sa come addolcire un'offerta.

translation.en: - Oh, there he is. - Hey.
translation.it: Eccolo lì. Dovevi fare un'entrata grandiosa, eh? Vieni qui.

translation.en: - Oh, had to make a grand entrance, huh?
translation.it: Dovevi fare un'entrata grandiosa, eh? Vieni qui.

translation.en: - Guess I missed a lot. - Hey.
- How was, uh-- how was the game?
- Oh, not bad.
Uh, Mr. Cassidy has two daughters on the squad--
translation.it: Il sig. Cassidy ha due figlie in squadra.

translation.en: - The little one stole the show.
People always say to me, "Bert, I bet you wish you had sons."
translation.it: Mi dicono sempre: "Scommetto che vorresti figli maschi".

translation.en: You know what I say to them? "Fuck that old news."
[laughs] I mean, right? Look at my girls.
Energy, swagger, balls.
- Yes, well, getting any of them to actually work is the hard part.
translation.it: La parte difficile è farle lavorare.

translation.en: - All right, that's the-- [laughs]
- It took me a while too. Matt helped me with that.
translation.it: Anch'io ci misi un po'. Mi aiutò Matt.

translation.en: I don't know where I would be without him.
translation.it: Non so dove sarei senza di lui.

translation.en: - Exactly where you are.
[laughs] Hell, don't be modest.
I didn't realize you followed Colette's career so closely.
translation.it: Non sapevo che seguissi Colette con tanta attenzione.

translation.en: - Oh, I follow winners.
translation.it: Non sapevo che seguissi Colette con tanta attenzione. Seguo i vincenti. E poi li compro.

translation.en: And then I buy them.
translation.it: Seguo i vincenti. E poi li compro.

translation.en: We've had this date together from the beginning-- all three of us.
translation.it: Questo incontro a tre era scritto sin dall'inizio.

translation.en: You look great. It's good to see you. I'm glad you could--Bill. - Thanks. - Come over here. I wanted to--
translation.it: - Che bello averti qui. Bill, ti mostro... - Grazie.

translation.en: - What the hell, B?
- [giggles] - Beth.
Put the fucking gun down.
- Listen to your friend.
- What friend?
I had a friend.
Not anymore.
- Beth. Look at me.
- She was my girl.
She was the only one. And she's gone.
translation.it: Era l'unica, e se n'è andata.

translation.en: - Put the fucking gun down.
Beth, come on.
Beth.
- Everything's bad.
You can't fight it.
- Let's just go, okay? You and me.
Let's go down to the factory and break some windows and go crazy.
translation.it: Andiamo alla fabbrica a rompere vetri e a fare le pazze.

translation.en: Okay? You and me.
Put the fucking gun down.
You and me.
- Yeah. - Just you and me.
Like the old days.
Okay?
Please?
- She gonna get into trouble with your coach?
- No.
No one's gonna say anything. I won't let them.
translation.it: Nessuno dirà nulla. Non lo permetterò.

translation.en: - Well, she's lucky to have you.
Our coach...
had eyes in the back of his head.
translation.it: aveva gli occhi dietro la testa.

translation.en: - You played? - Hundred years ago.
Over in Allanville.
Best time of my life.
Goes by quick, though.
And you never get it back.
I was gonna tell you.
- It turns out you were right.
About the shoes, I mean.
We can't afford them.
- Everything's changing.
You're changing.
- No, I'm not.
- Addy, you're a good person.
You don't know how it works.
People like that, they throw you away.
translation.it: Le persone così ti buttano via.

translation.en: - People like what?
Go to sleep.
Everything's okay.
- ♪ I hope that our memories stay ♪
- You're still my girl, right, Addy?
translation.it: Sei ancora la mia ragazza, vero?

translation.en: - Yeah.
- What?
- My phone.
I must have left it up at Lanvers.
- Coach told me something once.
translation.it: La coach una volta mi disse una cosa.

translation.en: She said,
"Someday, you're gonna really want something."
translation.it: "Un giorno ci sarà qualcosa che vorrai davvero.

translation.en: "That's when you'll find out who you are."
translation.it: Sarà allora che scoprirai chi sei."

translation.en: - Oh. Got it.
- But there's a price for everything.
You have to give up the old things...
the things that feel easy,
the things that feel safe.
This is how you become strong.
translation.it: È così che si diventa forti.

translation.en: This is how you become a woman.
translation.it: È così che si diventa donne."

translation.en: We're not saying anything.
We're not saying--
- [laughing] - We're not saying-- Beth!
In the end...
I couldn't stop it.
Any of it.
